title: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos
text:
Photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Golden State Warriors center DeMarcus Cousins, left, fouls Toronto Raptors center Serge Ibaka during the fourth quarter of Game 1 of the NBA Finals at Scotiabank Arena in Toronto on Thursday, May 30. Toronto won the game 118-109 to take a lead in the series against the defending champions. Hide Caption 1 of 28

Photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Liverpool players celebrate on top of a team bus surrounded by cheering fans during a parade to celebrate their Champions League title in Liverpool, England, on Sunday, June 2. Hide Caption 2 of 28

Photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Andy Ruiz Jr. punches Anthony Joshua during their heavyweight title fight at Madison Square Garden in New York City, on Saturday, June 1. Joshua, the favorite entering the fight, suffered a stunning upset , losing by technical knockout in the seventh round. With the win, Ruiz became the first Mexican-American heavyweight world champion. Hide Caption 3 of 28

Photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Serena Williams walks along the baseline during her French Open third round singles match against Sofia Kenin at Roland Garros in Paris, France, on Saturday, June 1. Kenin, the underdog, defeated Williams in straight sets. Hide Caption 4 of 28

Photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Virgil van Dijk of Liverpool, top, celebrates after winning the Champions League Final, while Tottenham's Harry Kane has a similar, but opposite reaction to losing the match held in Madrid, Spain, on Saturday, June 1. Hide Caption 5 of 28

Photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Torey Krug of the Boston Bruins checks Robert Thomas of the St. Louis Blues during the third period of Game 1 of the Stanley Cup Final at TD Garden on Monday, May 27. Hide Caption 6 of 28

Photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos A triathlete competes in the cycling portion of the Ironman Florianopolis in Florianopolis, Brazil on Sunday, May 26. Hide Caption 7 of 28

Photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Union Berlin players drench themselves in beer in celebration after a match against VfB Stuttgart in Berlin, Germany, on Monday, May 27. Union Berlin was celebrating their promotion to the Bundesliga, the top flight of German soccer. Hide Caption 8 of 28

Photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Rhiannan Iffland of Australia dives from the 21 meter platform during the third stop of the Red Bull Cliff Diving World Series in Polignano a Mare, Italy on Sunday, June 2. Hide Caption 9 of 28

Photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Kurumi Nara plays a backhand return to Slovenia's Dalila Jakupovic during their women's singles first round match on day two of the French Open in Paris, France on Monday, May 27. Hide Caption 10 of 28

Photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Corgis race during the Southern California "Corgi Nationals" championship at the Santa Anita Horse Racetrack in Arcadia, California, on Sunday, May 26. Hide Caption 11 of 28

Photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos New York Yankees right fielder Clint Frazier, right, avoids a collision with second baseman DJ LeMahieu as he catches a ball during the ninth inning of a baseball game against the Kansas City Royals in Kansas City, Missouri, on May 26. Hide Caption 12 of 28

Photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Esapekka Lappi and Janne Ferm of Finland compete during the FIA World Rally Championship Vodafone de Portugal shakedown in Baltar, Portugal, on May 30. Hide Caption 13 of 28

Photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos A fan, with his face painted like the Indian flag, looks on during a Cricket World Cup match between Bangladesh and India in Cardiff, England, on Tuesday, May 28. Hide Caption 14 of 28

Photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Pittsburgh Pirates right fielder Melky Cabrera collides at home plate with Cincinnati Reds catcher Tucker Barnhart to score a run during the fourth inning of their game at Great American Ballpark in Cincinnati on Monday, May 27. Hide Caption 15 of 28

Photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Pascal Siakam of the Toronto Raptors drives to the basket while being defended during Game 1 of the NBA Finals in Toronto on Thursday, May 30. Siakam shot 82.4% from the field and finished with a team-leading 32 points. Hide Caption 16 of 28

Photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Marcell Ozuna of the St. Louis Cardinals douses teammate Kolten Wong after defeating the Chicago Cubs at Busch Stadium in St. Louis on Sunday, June 2. Hide Caption 17 of 28

Photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Haruka Amamoto of Japan hits her tee shot on the fourth hole during the second round of the U.S. Women's Open Championship at the Country Club of Charleston on Friday, May 31. Hide Caption 18 of 28

Photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Rodrigo Ríos of Granada CF celebrates scoring his team's opening goal during the La Liga 123 match between Granada CF and Cadiz CF at Los Carmenes Stadium in Granada, Spain on Sunday, May 26. Hide Caption 19 of 28

Photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Addin Fonua-Blake of the Sea Eagles, center left, is tackled during the round 12 NRL match between the Penrith Panthers and the Manly Warringah Sea Eagles at Panthers Stadium in Sydney, Australia, on May 30. Hide Caption 20 of 28

Photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Salisbury's Martha Hutzell races downfield during the NCAA Division III Women's Lacrosse Championship held at Randolph-Macon College Day Field in Ashland, Virginia on Sunday, May 26. Hide Caption 21 of 28

Photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos New York Mets first baseman Dominic Smith ducks under the leg of Los Angeles Dodgers center fielder Enrique Hernandez after being called out at second base during the eighth inning of their game at Dodger Stadium in Los Angeles on Monday, May 27. Hide Caption 22 of 28

Photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Cyclists ride during the stage seventeen of the 102nd Tour of Italy in Antholz, Italy on May 29. Hide Caption 23 of 28

Photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Sesame Street character Big Bird assists the umpires with the exchange of lineup cards prior to a game between the New York Yankees and the Boston Red Sox at Yankee Stadium on Friday, May 31. Hide Caption 24 of 28

Photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Yaimé Perez of Cuba competes in women's Discus Throw during the IAAF Diamond League in Stockholm, Sweden on May 30. Hide Caption 25 of 28

Photos: What a shot! 28 amazing sports photos Colorado Rockies player Raimel Tapia shakes water from his head after being doused in celebration of his 11th inning walk-off single against the Arizona Diamondbacks in Denver, Colorado, on Monday, May 27. The Rockies won 4-3. Hide Caption 26 of 28
